definition: to twist (strands into a thread)/to entangle/to wring/to hang (by the neck)/to turn/to wind/classifier for skeins of yarn
meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130

sentences.english: Fried in the pan, add Minced meat.
sentences.chinese: 放入油锅炒熟，加入绞肉泥一并炒熟。

sentences.english: Choose when wringing the flesh, best also can replace beef with chicken or turkey bosom.
sentences.chinese: 选用绞肉时，最好也能用鸡肉或火鸡胸来代替牛肉。

sentences.english: Then we remove the blade from the mincing machine and install an extrusion attachment.
sentences.chinese: 然后我们取出绞肉机的刀片，再安上一种挤压零件。

sentences.english: Boys, i know i'm sending you into the meat grinder on this one.
sentences.chinese: 小子们，我知道我正把你们送进一个绞肉机里。

sentences.english: Then we grind all the meat in the mincing machine.
sentences.chinese: 然后我们把所有肉放进绞肉机绞碎。

sentences.english: If they want to feed themselves head first into that meat grinder, let em.
sentences.chinese: 如果他们想要把他们的头送入绞肉机里，那么请便吧。

definition: cabbage/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]/Taiwan pr. [gao1 li4 cai4]
cooking starch/pasty mixture of starch and water
minced meat sauce/(fig.) mincemeat/a person cut to pieces
